net.sourceforge.taglets.impl
Class DefaultLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.DefaultLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class DefaultLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

Basic logger for messages that cannot be printed using the standard JavaDoc doclet logging facility.

Version:
1.12 (2008/03/30 12:43:20)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.3.0

Constructor Detail

DefaultLogger

public DefaultLogger(DefaultConfiguration configuration)
Creates a new default logger.

Uses the prefix "Taglets: " and writes to System.out for standard output and to System.err for error messages.

The configuration keys "verbose", "debug" and "splash" in the configuration supplied are uesd to configure if info, debug and splash messages are dumped.

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration to read the dump values from.
See Also:
DefaultLogger( String, PrintStream, PrintStream, boolean, boolean, boolean )
Since:
1.3.0

DefaultLogger

public DefaultLogger(String prefix,
                     PrintStream out,
                     PrintStream err,
                     boolean info,
                     boolean debug,
                     boolean splash)
Creates a new logger that logs messages with the specified prefix on the given streams.

Parameters:
prefix - the prefix to log messages with (note, splash(String) is the only log method that bypasses the prefix.
out - the standard output stream to use.
err - the error stream to use.
info - indicates if info(String) messages are dumped.
debug - indicates if debug(String) messages are dumped.
splash - indicates if splash(String) messages are dumped.
Since:
1.3.0

Since:

dump

protected void dump(PrintStream ps,
                    Throwable t)
Dumps the specified throwable to the given print stream.

Info:

If debugging is enabled a full stack trace is printed.

Parameters:
ps - the print stream to print on.
t - the throwable to dump.
Since:
1.3.0

splash

public void splash(String message)
Dumps a splash message to the standard output stream.

Note:

This method ignores the prefix specified at construction time and logs without prefix.

Parameters:
message - the message to dump.
Since:
1.3.0

warning

public void warning(Throwable t)
Dumps the specified as error message to the standard error stream if debugging is enabled, else only the class and message are printed.

Parameters:
t - the throwable to dump.
Since:
1.3.0

error

public void error(Throwable t)
Dumps the specified as error message to the standard error stream if debugging is enabled, else only the class and message are printed.

Parameters:
t - the throwable to dump.
Since:
1.3.0

debug

public void debug(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified debugging message.

Note:

Debugging messages are only printed if the debug option is activated at the taglets configuration.

Specified by:
debug in interface Logger
Parameters:
message - the debugging message to log.
Since:
1.3.0

info

public void info(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified information message.

Note:

Informational messages are only printed if verbose message output is activated at the taglets configuration.

Specified by:
info in interface Logger
Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.3.0

warning

public void warning(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified warning message.

Note:

Warning messages printed using the simple logger are completely separate from the JavaDoc doclet logging facility.

Specified by:
warning in interface Logger
Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.3.0
